name: ChargeCode
comment: Maintains valid charge codes values, which can be used to represent a charge, a credit or discount that can be applied to a service and used when an invoice or bill gets generated. Each charge code is defined with a set of properties, which are based on the type of charge, such as, Usage Charge, Recurring Charge or Onetime charge.* OCLPYMNTFEE – Late Payment Fee* UCVCECALLCHRG – Usage charge for voice calls
vf short description: Maintains valid charge codes values, which can be used to represent a charge, a credit or discount that can be applied to a service and used when an invoice or bill gets generated.

fields.name: ChargeCodeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ValidFromDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity begin in EDWH

fields.name: ValidUntilDate
fields.comment: BI field which represents record validity end in EDWH

fields.name: KeyTypeId
fields.comment: Key type of record

fields.name: ChargeCodeKey
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the charge code in ALDM. Each charge code key value represents a unique charge code. BL1_CHARGE_CODE.CHARGE_CODE//Generated Key on Charge Code Id

fields.name: ChargeCodeDesc
fields.comment: Describes the charge code. BL1_CHARGE_CODE.DESCRIPTION

fields.name: ChargeCodeId
fields.comment: Unique identifier of the charge code in the source system. BL1_CHARGE_CODE.CHARGE_CODE

fields.name: ChargeCodeClassification
fields.comment: Classification of the charge codes into groups, such as credit charges, recurring charges, and usage charges. BL1_CHARGE_CODE.CLASSIFICATION

fields.name: ChargeQuantityInd
fields.comment: Indicates whether the charge is of a monetary type or is based on loyalty points.Values are:M - MONETARY P - POINTS BL1_CHARGE_CODE.CHARGE_QUANTITY

fields.name: DiscountableFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the charge is associated with the charge code that is considered for discount calculation.Values are:- 1 - Yes- 0 - No BL1_CHARGE_CODE.DISCOUNTABLE_IND

fields.name: TaxIncludedFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the charge amount in the charge request includes tax. If yes, then the system removes the tax amount from the gross amount, but maintains the net amount and the tax amount.Values are:D - INCLUDED_IN_DYN_ATTR (Included in the dynamic attributes).E - EXTERNAL F - INCLUDED_IN_FILE I - INCLUDED_IN_AMOUNT N - NOT_INCLUDED BL1_CHARGE_CODE.TAX_INCLUDED_IND

fields.name: TaxCalculationFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether the tax should be calculated for the charge code. For example, tax is not calculated for loyalty point charges.Values are:- 1 - Tax is calculated.- 0 - Tax is not calculated. BL1_CHARGE_CODE.TAX_CALC_IND

fields.name: CreateZeroChargeFlag
fields.comment: Indicates whether to create a charge for a zero amount.Values are :- 1 - Yes- 0 - No BL1_CHARGE_CODE.CREATE_ZERO_CHARGE_IND

fields.name: RevenueTypeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: ChargeEntityTypeInd
fields.comment: Specifies the charge entity type (CET) for the charge code. Each charge entity type is a set of attributes that exist on each charge with the same charge code.For example:- RC base CET- OC base CET- General OC CET- Charge- UC M-commerce CET BL1_CHARGE_CODE.CHARGE_ENT_TYPE

fields.name: TaxCodeSK
fields.comment: Surrogate key of the object

fields.name: SourceSystemId
fields.comment: Represents the code of the source system that the leading entity of the current target is coming from. It is suffix also include the code of the DB instance on that system such that in case of multiple instances of the same source system are deployed (Scalability) it will be possible to trace the target to it is source system instance

fields.name: DeleteIndicator
fields.comment: Set to True when the leading source entity of this target entity was deleted in the source system

fields.name: RowUpdateTime
fields.comment: The time stamp when the row was written to the Target real-time/staging storage

fields.name: SourceUpdateTime
fields.comment: The latest create/update timestamp of any of the entities composing this target entity

fields.name: SourceQueryTime
fields.comment: The timestamp of reading the data from source system. - when using CDC it is usually similar to the latest update, in SQL cases it is the time of running the SQL. When a dummy target entity is created as a temporary entity to maintain referential integrity this indicator will be set to True. As soon as the real target entity is stored it will be stored with False dummy indicator value.

fields.name: DptiId
fields.comment: Counter which represents the cycle number of the job	is_deleted	boolean	is_deleted	Represents if the record is deleted. Is been updated after the compaction job

fields.name: PTime
fields.comment: Partition time based on the event time for target entities marked to be partitioned event time rounded the correct partition window (hourly, daily etc..)

fields.name: Insert_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which inserted the record in the table

fields.name: Update_Load_Id
fields.comment: BI technical field for job id which updated the record in the table
